# Make adapter file
```{bash}
source run_star_config.sh
mkdir -p $INFO
echo ">Adapter
AGATCGGAAGAGCACACGTCTGAACTCCAGTCA
>AdapterRead2
AGATCGGAAGAGCGTCGTGTAGGGAAAGAGTGT
>Adapter_rc
TGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTCTTCCGATCT
>AdapterRead2_rc
ACACTCTTTCCCTACACGACGCTCTTCCGATCT" >  $INFO/neb_e7600_adapters.fasta
head $INFO/neb_e7600_adapters.fasta
```

# Download and Index Genome
```{bash}
source run_star_config.sh
mkdir -p $GENOME_DIR
wget --no-verbose --directory-prefix ${GENOME_DIR} ${FA_URL} 
wget --no-verbose --directory-prefix ${GENOME_DIR} ${GTF_URL}
gunzip -f ${FA}.gz
gunzip -f ${GTF}.gz

ls ${GENOME_DIR}
```


```{bash}
source run_star_config.sh
mkdir -p ${STAR_OUT}
STAR \
    --runMode genomeGenerate \
    --genomeDir $GENOME_DIR \
    --genomeFastaFiles ${FA} \
    --sjdbGTFfile ${GTF} \
    --outFileNamePrefix ${STAR_OUT}/genome_ \
    --genomeSAindexNbases 11
# --genomeSAindexNbases 6
```
